page.title: 13Transport In Rufforth
page.content:
In Rufforth there are {138}cars.{23} families have none. There are{153} bicycles.{32}families have none.There are{23}motor bikes in the village.{102 {families dont have one.}The nearest airport is Leeds Bradford which is about{25}miles away. The nearest bus station is in Wetherby which is about 8 miles away and the nearest Railway Station is York which is{5}miles away.
The cost of travel into York by bus is :- for a child{35p}single or{65p return,for an adult {70p }single Â£1.30 return.{53}people use the bus service regularly. There is no bus on Sundays.The last bus in the evening is at {3}minutes past{six.}
